capabilities.name: Web Resilience
capabilities.description: Capability of surviving to security incidents involving a web server, by implementing proper strategies aimed at preserving business continuity, achieved through redundancy and/or diversity.

capabilities.name: Vulnerability Scanning
capabilities.description: Capability of detecting the vulnerabilities a machine (along with the installed software) is subject to.

capabilities.name: DOS Detection and Mitigation
capabilities.description: Capability of detecting and reacting to security attacks aimed at distrupting a system's availability.
